messages: I love you more.
I couldn't imagine my life without you, nor would I ever want to.
You chase all my demons away.
You make my days worth living for.
There is nothing that we can't accomplish babe.
I love you more than I love flannel, cats, video games, and Chinese food combined.
I love you and I want to spend the rest of my life proving that.
I'm proud to have you.
Everything about you makes me happy.
I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
I want to go on all the adventures with you by my side.
I can't wait until we can spend our lives together as husband and wife.
Every time I think of you, I feel better.
You're perfect just the way you are.
You are the Watson to my Sherlock.
I want to spend a lazy Sunday with you watching it storm outside and reading.
I want nothing more than to grow old with you.
I love you to the moon and back.
Soon we won't be so far away.
We are so much stronger than distance.
You are my world babe.
They say love hurts, but I'm willing to take that risk with you.
Never give up. It took me years to find you, after all.
I will never give up on us.
I would climb a thousand mountains if it meant I could see you smile once.
I would be like a lost puppy without you.
I've finally found someone that makes my soul happy.
You are my everything.
Hearing from you makes my mood change for the better.
You complete me.
Knowing that I could make a decent website for you made me so happy.
Thank you for everything you've done for me.
It would take more than just this website to show how much I love you.
This website brought to you by someone who loves you very much.
I want to explore the world with you.
There are only two times I want to be with you... now and forever.
I hope you have the greatest day ever and everything goes your way.
I only wish you could love yourself as much as I do.
The more I get to know you, the more I fall in love with you.
I love you more than Kanye loves Kanye.
You are my first thought in the morning and my last thought at night.
Perfect is such a weak word to describe you.
November 4th was the greatest thing to come out of 2016.
I would go through all the heartbreak again if it meant I could spend the rest of my life with you.
A beautiful website for a beautiful girl.
